author: Craig Nelson
title: Taliban Attack Tests Afghan Forces Near Iran Border
text:
KABUL—Fighting raged Tuesday between Taliban militants and Afghan government forces for control of a provincial capital near the Iranian border, local officials said, in a confrontation shaping up as a stern test of U.S. efforts to build an effective, local force.
The Taliban launched a coordinated assault on Farah shortly after midnight, and quickly overran checkpoints at the city’s edge. The Islamist militant group is present in most areas of Afghanistan, but the attack was a high-stakes attempt to do something it has vowed...
